Actions.Name: Headbutt
Effects: Foe most save or become winded.

Actions.Name: Grab
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe must save or become grabbed by this character. If they're winded, they fail the save. While a foe is grabbed, the foe and the Crusher are immobile, and the grabbed foe takes [fray] damage at the start of their turns. If shoved or moved apart, or this ability is used again, the grab ends. A foe can save at the end of their turn to end a grab.
